nodes.excerpt: Unleash the power of AI to generate 100% original content that reads like it was written by a human - and do it in seconds. No more copy & paste. No more spinning.
nodes.title: AI Article Writer - Generate articles and blog posts in seconds with AI
nodes.author: Samanyou Garg

localize.description: 释放人工智能的力量，生成100%的原创内容，读起来就像人类写的一样--而且只需几秒钟。没有更多的复制和粘贴。没有更多的旋转。
localize.tagline: 用AI在几秒钟内生成文章和博客文章。

localize.description: 釋放人工智能的力量，生成100%的原創內容，讀起來就像人類寫的一樣--而且只需幾秒鐘。沒有更多的複製和粘貼。沒有更多的旋轉。
localize.tagline: 用AI在幾秒鐘內生成文章和博客文章。

nodes.excerpt: Deepfake videos online are growing exponentially. How to verify if you are watching a fake video? AI-generated social profiles are now ubiquitous. How to make sure that your last LinkedIn connection is not a fake person? Analyze them with Sensity.
nodes.title: Sensity - The deepfake detection platform
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 网上的深层假视频正在成倍增长。如何验证你看的是否是假视频？AI生成的社交资料现在已经无处不在。如何确定你最后的LinkedIn连接不是一个假人？用Sensity来分析它们。
localize.tagline: 深度造假检测平台

localize.description: 網上的深層假視頻正在成倍增長。如何驗證你看的是否是假視頻？AI生成的社交資料現在已經無處不在。如何確定你最後的LinkedIn連接不是一個假人？用Sensity來分析它們。
localize.tagline: 深度造假檢測平臺

nodes.excerpt: Labeling images is essential for good computer vision models. Roboflow Annotate empowers you to annotate images easily & model-assisted labeling can take a first pass at labeling your images for you! You can export to any format (COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XML…)
nodes.title: Roboflow Annotate - Annotate images with ease. Export to any format.
nodes.author: Michael 😍 Galpert

localize.description: 给图像贴标签是做好计算机视觉模型的关键。Roboflow Annotate使您能够轻松地对图像进行标注，并且模型辅助标注可以为您的图像进行第一次标注！Roboflow Annotate可以为您提供任何格式的输出（COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XML...）。你可以导出为任何格式（COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XML...）。
localize.tagline: 轻松注释图像。导出为任何格式。

localize.description: 給圖像貼標籤是做好計算機視覺模型的關鍵。Roboflow Annotate使您能夠輕鬆地對圖像進行標註，並且模型輔助標註可以爲您的圖像進行第一次標註！Roboflow Annotate可以爲您提供任何格式的輸出（COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XML...）。你可以導出爲任何格式（COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XML...）。
localize.tagline: 輕鬆註釋圖像。導出爲任何格式。

nodes.excerpt: Restore and repair pictures with AI. Hotpot builds on the latest research to automatically remove scratches, sharpen colors, and enhance faces, transforming damaged photos into cherished memories. Repair both color photos and black & white images for free.
nodes.title: AI Picture Restoration - Free way to remove scratches, sharpen colors, and fix photos
nodes.author: Clarence Hu

localize.description: 用AI还原和修复图片。火锅基于最新的研究，自动去除划痕、锐化色彩、增强面部，将受损的照片变成珍贵的回忆。免费修复彩色照片和黑白图像。
localize.tagline: 免费去除划痕、锐化色彩、修复照片的方法。

localize.description: 用AI還原和修復圖片。火鍋基於最新的研究，自動去除劃痕、銳化色彩、增強面部，將受損的照片變成珍貴的回憶。免費修復彩色照片和黑白圖像。
localize.tagline: 免費去除劃痕、銳化色彩、修復照片的方法。

nodes.excerpt: - FIFO queue to automate Github CI/CD workflows - 3 mins quick setup - Avoid conflicts and keep builds green - Keep Pull Requests up to date with the base branches - Automatically dequeue failed builds
nodes.title: MergeQueue - Automate Github’s CI/CD in under 3 mins
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: - FIFO队列使Github的CI/CD工作流程自动化 - 3分钟快速设置 - 避免冲突并保持绿色构建 - 保持Pull请求与基础分支的更新 - 自动取消失败构建的queue。
localize.tagline: 在3分钟内自动完成Github的CI/CD工作。

localize.description: - FIFO隊列使Github的CI/CD工作流程自動化 - 3分鐘快速設置 - 避免衝突並保持綠色構建 - 保持Pull請求與基礎分支的更新 - 自動取消失敗構建的queue。
localize.tagline: 在3分鐘內自動完成Github的CI/CD工作。

nodes.excerpt: Docsumo is a Document AI software that helps enterprises capture and analyse unstructured documents. Use prebuilt APIs to convert invoices bank statements, tax returns, ACORD forms & ID cards into JSON/CSV. Get accurate analytics for automated decisions.
nodes.title: Extract Tables by Docsumo - Free tool to extract tables from PDF and Images
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Docsumo是一款文档人工智能软件，帮助企业捕捉和分析非结构化文档。使用预建的API将发票、银行对账单、纳税申报表、ACORD表格和身份证转换为JSON/CSV。获取准确的分析结果，实现自动化决策。
localize.tagline: 从PDF和图像中提取表格的免费工具

localize.description: Docsumo是一款文檔人工智能軟件，幫助企業捕捉和分析非結構化文檔。使用預建的API將發票、銀行對賬單、納稅申報表、ACORD表格和身份證轉換爲JSON/CSV。獲取準確的分析結果，實現自動化決策。
localize.tagline: 從PDF和圖像中提取表格的免費工具

nodes.excerpt: ReWrap your Spotify Wrapped to discover artists you’ve never heard of based on the sound of songs you already listen to. Powered by the Andrson algorithm, trained on over 200 hours of music.

nodes.excerpt: Shopping online can be hard and expensive. Closet AI lets you upload a photo of a clothing item from the internet or your own closet and quickly uses AI to build an outfit that matches your item based on 100,000+ items, 100+ brands and your price range! 🚀

nodes.excerpt: Draftshot is an app that predicts how popular your shots might be before you upload it on Dribbble. Whether it's a logo, web design or illustration, it doesn't matter. Draftshot uses machine learning to predict popularity of any design.

localize.tagline: 预测你的投篮在Dribbble上的受欢迎程度。

localize.description: Draftshot是一款應用，它可以在你上傳到Dribbble之前就預測你的鏡頭可能會有多受歡迎。無論是logo、網頁設計還是插畫，都不在話下。Draftshot使用機器學習來預測任何設計的受歡迎程度。

nodes.excerpt: Meet Maya your virtual assistant for entrepreneurs. Maya will be running tasks, listening, and communicating on what you need to grow your idea. She will keep you up to date on your current progress and provide the next step you need to take.

nodes.excerpt: Based on the AI technology, we train the system to remove scratches and restore the old family photographs in one click. It is difficult to repair damaged photos without advanced PhotoShop skills. But now, you can do it like a pro with 3 steps!

nodes.excerpt: One of life’s most enjoyable moments is finding new favorite songs, but this is often a solo experience. We analyze you and a friend's Spotify listening histories to curate a playlist full of recommended songs made just for the two of you to Discover Together.

nodes.excerpt: Robots are here to save your Valentine's Day! Send a card to your crush — you can always play it cool by saying "Look how awesome AI is") Tweet your cards & how the recipient reacted to @copysmith_ai - 1 brave romantic will win a Doordash dinner for two 💌

localize.description: 机器人来拯救你的情人节了! 发送一张卡片给你的暗恋对象--你可以说："看看人工智能有多厉害"）在Tweet上发布你的卡片以及收件人对@copysmith_ai的反应--1名勇敢的浪漫主义者将赢得双人Doordash晚餐💌。
localize.tagline: 用AI给你爱的人写贺卡和诗。

localize.description: 機器人來拯救你的情人節了! 發送一張卡片給你的暗戀對象--你可以說："看看人工智能有多厲害"）在Tweet上發佈你的卡片以及收件人對@copysmith_ai的反應--1名勇敢的浪漫主義者將贏得雙人Doordash晚餐💌。
localize.tagline: 用AI給你愛的人寫賀卡和詩。

nodes.excerpt: Bored of budgeting apps? Try to gamify the experience! You can compete with yourself to save more than last month. Cash Coach will draw your objective line and get mad if you start to overspend! Succeed and your avatar will gain trophies 🏆 and experience 👑
nodes.title: Cash Coach - The personal finance app you’ll open everyday
nodes.author: Seth Louey

localize.description: 厌倦了预算应用？尝试游戏化的体验吧! 你可以和自己竞争，比上个月节省更多。Cash Coach会给你划出目标线，如果你开始超支，就会生气! 成功后，你的头像将获得奖杯🏆和经验👑。
localize.tagline: 你每天都会打开的个人理财应用

localize.description: 厭倦了預算應用？嘗試遊戲化的體驗吧! 你可以和自己競爭，比上個月節省更多。Cash Coach會給你劃出目標線，如果你開始超支，就會生氣! 成功後，你的頭像將獲得獎盃🏆和經驗👑。
localize.tagline: 你每天都會打開的個人理財應用

nodes.excerpt: Browse the best parts of your favorite shows, and enjoy a bite-sized method to discover new ones, via a personalized feed of 60-second highlights generated based on your existing library and interests.
nodes.title: Podz - The best parts of podcasts in a personalized feed
nodes.author: Jackson Deane

localize.description: 浏览您最喜爱的节目中最精彩的部分，并通过根据您现有的资料库和兴趣生成的60秒精彩内容的个性化馈送，享受发现新节目的比特大小方法。
localize.tagline: 个性化喂养中播客的精华部分

localize.description: 瀏覽您最喜愛的節目中最精彩的部分，並通過根據您現有的資料庫和興趣生成的60秒精彩內容的個性化饋送，享受發現新節目的比特大小方法。
localize.tagline: 個性化餵養中播客的精華部分
